# Admin Review Workflow for Uploaded Data

**Description:**
Introduce an admin review process for all uploaded student data and documents. Admins should be able to approve, reject, or request more information for each submission.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Admin dashboard for reviewing pending uploads.
- Approve, reject, or request clarification on each document or data entry.
- Notify users of the review outcome.
- Only approved data is visible in student profiles.

**Benefits:**
- Ensures data quality and authenticity.
- Prevents fraudulent or incorrect information from being accepted.
- Provides transparency and accountability in the review process.
